summary: Backend-focused software engineer with over 5 years of experience building distributed systems and high-performance APIs using .NET and Azure. Skilled in modern C# and .NET Core with a track record of designing resilient microservices, improving database performance, and applying design principles that keep systems flexible and maintainable. Comfortable working in cloud-native environments and delivering solutions that balance technical precision with business value.

Collaborated closely with product teams to refine requirements in an Agile environment.
